title: Absolution
description: The End of the World was Only the Beginning. What would YOU do... How would YOU react?Volume 8 of The Dead Years starts with a revelation. We get a glimpse of the distrubing images of those left behind and things they will do to survive, through the eyes of someone we may already know.The facilites of Blackmore walk the line between being a safe harbor for the group and a portal straight into hell.A familiar face returns to add a new level of tension to the story. Their journey back leaves nothing to the imagination, as things are witnessed that should never see the light of day.Our group is pushed to the end and back. The decisions they are forced to make come with the most dire of consequences. No one is safe.Does anyone make it to sunrise?This is Volume 8... Where Humanity Ends!
author: Jeff Olah
